name: Encyclopaedia Britannica
description: One of the most trusted sources of general knowledge, available in both digital and print formats.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is a well-established and authoritative source of knowledge with a long history of scholarly information.
notes: Known for its authoritative content, rigorously fact-checked and continually updated.

name: World Book Encyclopedia
description: Provides comprehensive information on a wide range of topics for learners of all ages.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is a respected source of encyclopedic knowledge known for its accuracy and reliability.
notes: The only general reference encyclopedia still published in print, widely used in educational settings.

name: Encyclopaedia Larousse
description: A major French-language encyclopedia available online, covering a wide range of general knowledge topics.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is the official site of one of France's most reputable publishers of dictionaries and reference works.
notes: Highly regarded in the Francophone world for its detailed and reliable content.

name: Treccani Encyclopedia
description: An Italian encyclopedia known for its comprehensive and scholarly articles.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is the official site of the Istituto della Enciclopedia Italiana, renowned for its authoritative and comprehensive reference works.
notes: A respected source of general knowledge in Italy, available online and in print.

name: Nationalencyklopedin (NE)
description: The leading Swedish-language encyclopedia, providing detailed articles on a wide array of subjects.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is the official site of Sweden's largest and most comprehensive encyclopedia.
notes: Widely used in Sweden for its authoritative and up-to-date information.

name: Great Russian Encyclopedia
description: A comprehensive Russian-language encyclopedia covering a broad spectrum of knowledge.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is the official site of Russia's authoritative national encyclopedia, published by a respected institution.
notes: Known for its extensive and detailed entries, respected in Russian-speaking regions.

name: Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy
description: A dynamic reference work maintained by experts in philosophy, providing peer-reviewed articles on philosophical topics.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is maintained by experts in the field and hosted by Stanford University, a leading academic institution.
notes: Highly regarded for its academic rigor and reliability in the field of philosophy.

name: Merriam-Webster's Encyclopedia of Literature
description: Provides detailed articles on a wide range of literary topics and authors.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is the official site of a long-standing and authoritative American publisher of dictionaries and reference works.
notes: Known for its comprehensive coverage and authoritative content in literature.

name: Oxford Research Encyclopedia
description: A collection of peer-reviewed, in-depth articles across multiple disciplines.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is associated with Oxford University Press, a highly respected and authoritative academic publisher.
notes: Offers high-quality, authoritative content authored by experts in their fields.

name: Columbia Encyclopedia
description: Offers comprehensive coverage of a wide range of topics, from general knowledge to specialized fields.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is the official site of a prestigious academic publisher affiliated with Columbia University.
notes: Known for its thorough and accurate information.

name: The Canadian Encyclopedia
description: Provides detailed information on Canadian history, culture, and notable figures.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is a well-established and authoritative source for information about Canada, maintained by a reputable organization.
notes: Authoritative source of information on Canadian topics.

name: Deutsche Biographie
description: A biographical dictionary that provides detailed information about notable German figures.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is the official site of a major German biographical reference work, maintained by the Bayerische Akademie der Wissenschaften.
notes: Highly respected for its detailed biographical entries.

name: Britannica School
description: An educational resource for students providing reliable information on a wide range of topics.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is part of the well-established Encyclopaedia Britannica, known for its accuracy and reliability.
notes: Widely used in educational settings for its authoritative and accessible content.

name: Espasa Calpe
description: A comprehensive Spanish-language encyclopedia with a focus on Iberian and Latin American knowledge.

description: A Chinese-language encyclopedia offering a vast range of knowledge on various topics.

description: A comprehensive Arabic-language reference work covering a vast range of knowledge areas.
